A--BB C--D---L
    \ | /    |
      EZ-G   M
      |
      F_I

A: Small  Cave. a small claustrophobic cave
BB: Other Cave. different cave
C: Small Cave. not the same cave
D: Dank Cave. cave is dank
EZ: Sloping Tunnel. the tunnel slopes
F: Wet Grotto. the grotto is wet
G: Cave Niche. a small niche in the cave wall
I: Under the Grotto. the bottom of the grotto
L: Less Dank Cave. a drier cave
M: Cave Ledge. a ledge overlooking the grotto
